comment._content: Internet Archive. OCSB Library. Full text of "Record of service of solicitors and articled clerks with His Majesty's forces, 1914-1919" CHARLES DOUGLAS WARD ARCHER. "Admitted Dec. 1898. Member of Murr, Rusby & Archer of 63 Lincoln's Inn Fields, W.C. Served as Capt. 23rd Div-ision Royal Field Artillery." Of interest is the modern firm associated with Leeds Building Society of ARCHER RUSBY SOLICITORS LIMITED, 1ST FLOOR WD31LA, (a postal code for Rickmansworth, Hertfordshire)

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Birth Archer Charles Douglas W Dartford 2a 87 1st qr 1875 Marriage Archer Charles Douglas W to Charlotte Helena Read or Alicia Maud M Leake in Fulham 1a 672 4th qr 1898 Death ARCHER Charles D W age 63 Kensington 1a 168 1st qr 1938 FreeBMD Birth Archer Vivien M F mother Leake born in Brentford 3a 347 3rd qr 1911 Marriage Archer Vivien M F to Bernard T Hardy in Kensington 1a 403 3rd qr 1941 FreeBMD
